data.title: English version :: Prague Youth Rugby Festival
images: https://8697bb6e80.cbaul-cdnwnd.com/95f6bb7d9c311ce9027e4ab2b64629d8/200006213-5935359355/š 428 x v 375 ořez EN PYRF 2023 duben April týmy na web - English-page-001_1.jpg
data.text:
Thank you for coming in October 2017 and see you soon again!

Some feedbacks:

RK Heusenstamm - Germany

we had a wonderful time in Prague…and again, the tournament was very well organized!

Thanks again to our hosts Petrovice and Ricany!

Thanks for having us!

CU next year in Prague or Heusenstamm!

RK Speed - Russia

Мы вернулись домой, впечатлений много и очень хорошие!

Спасибо за турнир, за организацию!

RK Speed and CSR (combined teams) - Danmark

I have only positive to say about the tournament. Everyone on our tour says the same. You and rest of the team have done a really great job, thank you.

What really impressed me was your constant, fast and qualified response to our many mails. You made it easy for us to organize the tour, thank you.

We needed an extra bus - on short notice - and you managed that without us feeling any problems- impressive!

We would like to visit again one day, and will recommend your tournament to what ever contacts we have.

RC Pegasus - Ukraine (small delegation of 4 players + 5 adults)

Большое спасибо за прекрасную организацию турнира! Детям и нам все очень понравилось!

Thank you for coming in April 2017 and see you sooon again!

National team of the Kaliningrad region (Russia)

Спасибо Виктор большое!!! Ребята добрались, все хорошо! Спасибо Вам за такой потрясающий турнир с таким большим количеством команд. Дети получили колоссальный опыт и удовольствие. Увидимся на следующем турнире!

RC Chadari (Georgia):

It was really nice to visit in Czech Republic. I'm sure we'll meet again. We still think the future tournaments to participate in PRAGUE YOUTH RUGBY FESTIVAL

USV Potsdam (Germany):

It was a really nice festival. Thanks lot for the arragements!

Kiev (Ukraine)

Большое спасибо за отличную организацию турнира! Детям и родителям очень понравилось! Все остались довольны и хотят приехать ещё. ... На следующую весну будем обязательно. Мы внесём ваш турнир в официальный календарь соревнований и попробуем выбить на него деньги из федерации регби. Наши чиновники, которые ездили с нами, были очень впечатлены вашим турниром и у же запланировали в конце сентября организовать международный детский регбийный фестиваль в Киеве. Ещё раз вам большое спасибо за организацию и внимание!

Veltener rugby verband (Germany)

A great great thanks to you and all those who planned it. It was one of the best planned Tournament where we have ever been. Great thanks to all for this great weekend, great planned tournament, great and fair games it was absolutely great ;) it was extreme great to see the kids play. After such a long time, we are happy and proud even more so that we could once again be in contact with Rugby Clubs where it was a great partnership a long time ago. We hope that we can revive the old friendships. We come definitively back to you, our children had a lot of fun and also the children would like to repeat this very gladly. Likewise, we are also excited about the sporting success of our kids Top 10 placement for the first international tournament.

Teddington (England)

The Czech Republic was not a destination we had considered for our U12s Coming of Age Tour but it turned out to be an inspired suggestion from Gullivers. The passion for the game and the quality of the opposition surprised us and was only matched by the warmth of our welcome. Off the field our accommodation was of a very high standard and the addition of a waterpark occupied the children in a way a conventional hotel could not have. Every aspect of the tour ran on time and with minimal fuss and the entire experience represented great value for money.
